messages.title: An invitation to meet Ed Miliband, the Leader of the Labour Party
messages.content: In less than two months time you will decide the future of Britain - and I want to speak directly with you about your choice. Over the coming weeks before the General Election, I will be setting out Labourâ€™s plan to take Britain in a new direction and build a future that works for you. I want to hear from you what matters most to your family and what you want from the next Labour government.

contactInformation.address: The Labour Party, C/O Potts Print (UK), Nelson Park, Cramlington, Northumberland NE23 1WG

images.caption: I want to know what you think

leaflet.additionalNotes: Please RSVP at the provided website or telephone number for a People's Question Time meeting in Bermondsey on Thursday 26 March. Doors open at 1:15pm.
